cta_general.en: Use clear and direct CTA. Focus on the action you want them to take. Examples: "Order now" or "Get it now"
cta_general.id: Gunakan CTA yang jelas dan direct. Fokus pada action yang ingin dilakukan. Contoh: "Pesan sekarang" atau "Dapatkan sekarang"

cta_tiktok.en: Use Gen Alpha language and 2025 trending terms. Focus on sustainability and AI features. Examples: "Check yellow cart for eco-friendly products!" or "AI-powered solution link in bio!"
cta_tiktok.id: Gunakan bahasa Gen Alpha dan trending 2025. Fokus pada sustainability dan AI features. Contoh: "Cek keranjang kuning untuk produk eco-friendly!" atau "Link AI-powered solution di bio!"

cta_shopee.en: Highlight eco-friendly shipping and AI recommendations. Mention carbon-neutral delivery. Examples: "Shopee now offers carbon-neutral delivery!" or "AI recommends the best products for you!"
cta_shopee.id: Highlight eco-friendly shipping dan AI recommendations. Mention carbon-neutral delivery. Contoh: "Shopee sekarang carbon-neutral delivery!" atau "AI rekomendasiin produk terbaik buat kamu!"

cta_instagram.en: Direct to sustainable content and AI tools. Use mindful language. Examples: "Sustainable living tips in bio!" or "AI productivity hacks, swipe up!"
cta_instagram.id: Arahkan ke sustainable content dan AI tools. Gunakan mindful language. Contoh: "Sustainable living tips di bio!" atau "AI productivity hacks, swipe up!"

cta_youtube.en: Invite to subscribe for AI tutorials and sustainability content. Examples: "Subscribe for latest AI tips!" or "Turn on notifications for sustainable living hacks!"
cta_youtube.id: Ajak subscribe untuk AI tutorials dan sustainability content. Contoh: "Subscribe untuk AI tips terbaru!" atau "Nyalakan notif untuk sustainable living hacks!"

cta_comment.en: Invite discussion about AI, sustainability, or mental health. Examples: "Share your AI experience in comments!" or "Tag a friend who needs digital detox!"
cta_comment.id: Ajak diskusi tentang AI, sustainability, atau mental health. Contoh: "Share pengalaman AI kamu di komen!" atau "Tag teman yang butuh digital detox!"

cta_urgency.en: Create urgency about climate action or AI adoption. Examples: "Before it's too late for our planet!" or "Before AI replaces your skills!"
cta_urgency.id: Urgency tentang climate action atau AI adoption. Contoh: "Sebelum terlambat untuk planet kita!" atau "Sebelum AI gantikan skill kamu!"

cta_scarcity.en: Emphasize limited edition sustainable products or early access AI tools. Examples: "Limited edition eco-friendly!" or "Early access AI beta for only 100 people!"
cta_scarcity.id: Tekankan limited edition sustainable products atau early access AI tools. Contoh: "Limited edition eco-friendly!" atau "Early access AI beta cuma 100 orang!"

cta_social_proof_cta.en: Use AI adoption data or sustainability movement statistics. Examples: "Join 1M+ who went green!" or "Like 500K+ AI early adopters..."
cta_social_proof_cta.id: Gunakan data adopsi AI atau sustainability movement. Contoh: "Join 1M+ yang udah go green!" atau "Seperti 500K+ AI early adopters..."

cta_benefit_focused.en: Focus on AI productivity or sustainable living benefits. Examples: "10x productivity with AI!" or "Save 70% carbon footprint!"
cta_benefit_focused.id: Fokus pada benefit AI productivity atau sustainable living. Contoh: "10x produktivitas dengan AI!" atau "Hemat 70% carbon footprint!"

cta_risk_reversal.en: Guarantee for AI tools or eco products. Examples: "AI doesn't work? 100% refund!" or "Not satisfied with eco-product? Free exchange!"
cta_risk_reversal.id: Garansi untuk AI tools atau eco products. Contoh: "AI gak cocok? Refund 100%!" atau "Gak puas dengan eco-product? Tukar gratis!"

cta_curiosity_gap.en: Create curiosity about AI secrets or sustainability hacks. Examples: "AI secret never shared before..." or "Sustainability hack that went viral..."
cta_curiosity_gap.id: Buat penasaran tentang AI secrets atau sustainability hacks. Contoh: "AI secret yang gak pernah dibagi..." atau "Sustainability hack yang viral..."

cta_exclusive.en: Exclusive access to AI community or sustainability program. Examples: "Exclusive AI mastermind!" or "VIP sustainable living program!"
cta_exclusive.id: Akses eksklusif ke AI community atau sustainability program. Contoh: "Exclusive AI mastermind!" atau "VIP sustainable living program!"

cta_interactive.en: Invite to participate in AI experiment or eco challenge. Examples: "Test AI with us!" or "Join 30-day sustainability challenge!"
cta_interactive.id: Ajak participate dalam AI experiment atau eco challenge. Contoh: "Test AI bareng kita!" atau "Join 30-day sustainability challenge!"

cta_storytelling.en: Continue AI journey or sustainability transformation story. Examples: "AI journey continuation at..." or "Complete transformation story at..."
cta_storytelling.id: Lanjutkan AI journey atau sustainability transformation story. Contoh: "Kelanjutan AI journey di..." atau "Transformation story lengkap di..."

cta_challenge.en: Challenge related to AI skills or sustainable habits. Examples: "7-day AI productivity challenge!" or "#SustainableLifestyle challenge!"
cta_challenge.id: Challenge terkait AI skills atau sustainable habits. Contoh: "Challenge AI productivity 7 hari!" atau "#SustainableLifestyle challenge!"

cta_add_to_cart.en: Direct add-to-cart CTA tailored to commerce flows. Examples: "Tap the cart now" / "Add to cart, checkout later".
cta_add_to_cart.id: CTA langsung tambah ke keranjang yang sesuai alur commerce. Contoh: "Tap keranjang sekarang" / "Tambah ke keranjang, checkout nanti".

cta_claim_voucher.en: Claim time-bound voucher/coupon. Examples: "Claim 20% voucher today" / "Claim coins before midnight".
cta_claim_voucher.id: Klaim voucher/kupon berbatas waktu. Contoh: "Klaim voucher 20% hari ini" / "Klaim koin sebelum tengah malam".

cta_chat_seller.en: Prompt to chat seller for bundle, sizing, or custom deals. Examples: "Chat seller for bundle price".
cta_chat_seller.id: Ajak chat penjual untuk bundling, ukuran, atau deal khusus. Contoh: "Chat penjual untuk harga bundling".

cta_follow_shop.en: Ask to follow the shop/brand for exclusive drops and vouchers.
cta_follow_shop.id: Ajak follow toko/brand untuk eksklusif drop dan voucher.

cta_join_live.en: Invite to join live shopping/AMA session. Examples: "Join our live at 7PM for extra voucher".
cta_join_live.id: Ajak bergabung ke live shopping/AMA. Contoh: "Join live jam 19.00 untuk voucher ekstra".

cta_reply_keyword.en: Comment a keyword to get link/template. Examples: "Comment LINK to get it" / "Reply: GUIDE".
cta_reply_keyword.id: Komentar keyword untuk dapat link/template. Contoh: "Komen LINK untuk dapat" / "Reply: PANDUAN".

cta_pinned_comment.en: Point to pinned comment (Shorts/Reels). Example: "Link in pinned comment".
cta_pinned_comment.id: Arahkan ke komentar tersemat (Shorts/Reels). Contoh: "Link di komentar teratas".

cta_save_share.en: Ask to save and share for algorithm lift. Example: "Save and share to help more people".
cta_save_share.id: Ajak simpan dan bagikan untuk dorong algoritma. Contoh: "Simpan & share biar lebih banyak yang kebantu".

cta_dm_keyword.en: DM a keyword to receive a resource. Example: "DM ‘CHECKLIST’ to get the PDF".
cta_dm_keyword.id: DM keyword untuk menerima resource. Contoh: "DM ‘CHECKLIST’ untuk terima PDF".

cta_join_broadcast.en: Invite to join IG broadcast channel for drops and codes.
cta_join_broadcast.id: Ajak join broadcast channel IG untuk drop dan kode.

cta_click_link_bio.en: Prompt viewers to tap the link in bio and tell exactly what they’ll get (guide, discount, template).
cta_click_link_bio.id: Arahkan untuk tap link di bio dan jelaskan tepatnya apa yang didapat (panduan, diskon, template).

cta_tap_product_tag.en: Ask them to tap the product tag to view price/specs and proceed to checkout.
cta_tap_product_tag.id: Minta mereka tap product tag untuk lihat harga/spesifikasi lalu lanjut ke checkout.

cta_tap_product_sticker.en: For stories/reels: tap the product sticker to open details and purchase.
cta_tap_product_sticker.id: Untuk story/reels: tap product sticker untuk buka detail & pembelian.

cta_collect_live_voucher.en: Collect the LIVE voucher now before it runs out; apply it at checkout.
cta_collect_live_voucher.id: Klaim voucher LIVE sekarang sebelum habis; pakai saat checkout.

cta_set_live_reminder.en: Set a reminder for the live session (date/time). Tell what exclusive they’ll miss if they don’t.
cta_set_live_reminder.id: Set pengingat untuk sesi live (tanggal/jam). Jelaskan apa yang eksklusif jika mereka tidak ikut.

cta_save_for_later.en: Tell them to save this post as a checklist/reference to revisit when buying or setting up.
cta_save_for_later.id: Ajak simpan postingan ini sebagai checklist/referensi saat beli atau setup.

cta_share_with_friends.en: Ask them to share with a friend who needs this (tagging is a bonus).
cta_share_with_friends.id: Ajak share ke teman yang butuh ini (boleh tag temannya).

cta_watch_full_review.en: Invite them to watch the full review (channel/handle), promising 1–2 concrete takeaways.
cta_watch_full_review.id: Ajak tonton full review (channel/handle) dengan janji 1–2 poin manfaat yang jelas.

cta_subscribe.en: Subscribe/Follow for the next drops, tutorials, and exclusive deals.
cta_subscribe.id: Subscribe/Follow untuk update berikutnya, tutorial, dan penawaran eksklusif.

cta_comment_questions.en: Ask questions in the comments; suggest a keyword they can type so you can reply with tailored advice.
cta_comment_questions.id: Tanyakan pertanyaan di kolom komentar; beri kata kunci agar kamu bisa balas dengan saran yang spesifik.
